content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 59, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 43, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft light_blue_stained_glass, I first need to craft light_blue_dye. The only light_blue_dye recipe I have ingredients for is 1 blue_orchid -> 1 light_blue_dye, so I will move the blue_orchid from slot 23 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have crafted light_blue_dye, I need to move it from the crafting grid to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
